structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Compensation of members of public boards and commissions.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 64.480 to 64.740 is intended to authorize the increase of the compensation now fixed by law for the members of any public board or commission for their services as members of the board or commission, except members of fiscal courts to the extent authorized in subsection (3) of KRS 64.530.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 24.
